review: DR. Geeth is sooo sweet. She explained everything thoroughly and in detail. All the anxiety is gone after meeting her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ***** ** ******* *** ***** *** ** *** **** ************ ** ********** She is very friendly and approachable and i know her since 2019.
She will listen to all the queries patiently (won't mind if you repeat the questions) and advise accordingly. Her excellent description, treatment and maturity gave me confidence and I was able to smoothly sail through all complications and anxieties during the tough times.
She has been a Friend, Philosopher & Guide throughout my journey of getting pregnant to the date i delivered a baby boy and thereafter also. I recall an incident which shows the kind of relationship she has with her patient. An hour before i went for labor, my husband's covid test report came out as positive. Dr Geeth handled the entire situation all by herself. Me including other hospital staff were awe struck with her kind, mature and brave act of putting on mask, gloves, face shield and PPE Kit & coming back with consent form signed by my husband. Her presence and comforting words helped me stay calm during the time when it really mattered. She also ensured that, Hospital took proper care of me and my baby post delivery in absence of attendant for next 2 days. May God bless her & her family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had taken help from several gynecologists from my late 20s till now. Most of my experiences with them are not at all satisfactory.  I am extremely greatful to Dr. Somashekar ( my family physician) who recommended to consult Dr. Geet monnappa. 

I had large cyst in my left ovary and also adenomiosis and endrometriousis in uterus.
Dr geet explained to me and my husband about various possible procedures,  which would take care of present problem,  as also evaluated the other risk factors which could arise in future. 
Keeping all the short term and log term issues and the need for future medical procedures at a later date, Dr advised me to undergo removal of ovaries and uterus by laproscopic procedure.
I had apprehension regarding undergoing a surgical procedure before meeting Dr geet , but her systematic approach,  diagnosis,  risk evaluation and conveying my health condition in a simple straight forward way, helped me to undergo the procedure with calmness.  I felt that I was in safe hands of a specialist doctor.

I would like to thank Dr. Geet monnappa for giving me great relief from my physical as well as mental stress associated with all women. 
Post operation has been a psinfree quick recovery and i am in better health now. 

Thank you so much doctor for all the experiences which I remember through out my life time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Geeth is a fantastic doctor! I stumbled my way across multiple doctors almost all over Bangalore before I went to Dr.Geeth. And I am thrilled that I did. I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better doctor. I requested that I wanted to experience normal delivery if possible without epidural as well. And more than me, she ensured I tried my best and pushed towards normal to consider my request. In fact I begged her to perform caesarean or give me epidural during my delivery, but she kept encouraging me to try, constantly telling everything is good so far and I can and should keep trying. My family and I am so impressed with her that I am suggesting her to everyone I know. From ensuring I eat healthy  and gain only as much required weight to a healthy delivery and post natal care, she has been the best!! She is now my go-to gynaec doctor! I strongly recommend her for all things gynaecology. She is extremely patient, kind and considers your request. I have had bad experiences with other doctors who were self centered. But not once did I feel that way about Dr Geeth. Thank you so much Dr for all that you did and continue to do!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We got in touch with Dr.Geeth Monappa for one of the complications we had during our pregnancy journey and we never looked back.
My wife had 2 complications due to bacterial infection in the first trimester and the second trimester and there were several other complications including a high NT and covid. 
Things which we really liked about the doctor is her knowledge, years of experience treating complicated cases, attention to detail and  her promptness. 
The doctor was very detailed in explaining things during all our checkups.(Yes she explained to both of us on all issues and what to expect in the coming days, which is not the same elsewhere). We could discuss the smallest doubts we had and Geeth would answer all questions with a smile. 
She guided us in all steps from the very first appointment to facilitating all the required details till we were in the labor room. We really felt the care when she would reach out to us to just check on how things are going with the pregnancy.
On 25th August 2021 we were proud parents to a very healthy baby and the doctor had been part of the complete journey with us.

Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Female Infertility Treatment,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Labor and Delivery,
review: This is Azad, I would like to share our journey with the Dr.Geeth since my wife getting conceived till delivery.. After so many miscarriages and was thinking to go for test tube baby suggested by another doctor with all reports normal, we were frustrated and upset. Fortunately my wife friend suggested to reach out Dr.Geeth and in first consultation itself I listened all positive things to push us mentally and  physically to get conceived naturally which I literally wanted as all reports were normal.  Then she did her own analysis and case study with couple of tests what to be considered and what to be ruled out to go for treatment. My wife got convinced with minimal medication naturally soon after meeting Dr.Geeth but sustaining the pregnancy was the actual problem for which she suggested the tablets and injections and got succeeded finishing 9 months without a single problem with her periodic checkups with personal follow-ups even if we forget the things to update her timely.Finally Doctor did a normal delivery in Fortis La Femme, so called corporate hospital :) ..** *** ******** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** **** **** She is more than a doctor, a friend, care taker, mentor and teacher....Thank you Doctor for all your support and its immeasurable!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Geeth Monnappa for my second pregnancy during my third trimester.. The doctor has been very caring towards me and had been monitoring my baby closely and she delivered my baby through c section as i had a c section prior to this .. We have a healthy baby boy and I'm very grateful to her. I have always had her immediate attention when ever I was in need of her and i have received the best medication for my issues, the doctor is just a text away and replies to ur issues ASAP. I strongly recommend Dr Geeth for any expecting mother or ladies who need a gynaecologist, Thank you for being there doctor and making my experience with you a best one..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Scan,
review:
A very warm and caring doctor who explains in detail and gives you time and attention. My pregnancy was a little difficult, but she made my experience a lot easier by being positive and motivating me. Her expertise helped in detecting my issues really quickly and benefited me and my baby. She gives you personal attention and is very prompt in responding even on call or text. 
I would definitely recommend Dr. Geeth to anyone who wants a doctor who is not intimidating and actually respects your time too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Writing this post for Dr Geeth Monappa, My Gynecologist.
Someone who has been such a pillar of support to me throughout my pregnancy, delivery and post delivery.

Her peaceful, warm personality and aura is something I will always remember.
She made me feel sooo comfortable throughout the entire process.

I truely believe God always sends angels in different forms, to help us in testing times.
Was almost next best to having felt my mum around when I really needed her...

Thank you for everything Dr Geeth, I'm truely blessed to have had you for Sia.
God bless üôè‚ù§Ô∏è

Anyone looking out for a Gynecologist, I highly recommend Dr Geeth - Fortis La Femme Hospital, Bangalore

Dr. Geeth is incredible. Not only has she taken great care of our Infertility, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Being new to Bangalore i had no idea about the best doctors fortis la frame happen to b my choice for consultation throughout my pregnancy that's how i got to know about Dr geeth monappa she's been simply the best one to whom i approached she had a close watch on my health issues considering my 1st delivery experience which was somewhere else, she's even guided me in every aspect of my health concern and also patiently heard all my issue since i had few complications inspite of all this she's very well cleared all my doubts and got through few complications with a lot of concern and got delivered my baby in such pandemic which is been more though not only that even after the delivery she's been in touch with me related to my health issues n even solved them.
Thank you Dr u have been simply the best:)

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was good but she didn't give a clear cut explanation for a scan result. Being a first mom I wasn't knowing many things about the health issue and repeatedly asking questions so that I can understand the issue. When I had a issue after the treatment when I called up her and enquiring, she told me that she has an another patient does that mean I'm not a patient anymore. Very much disturbing and unsatisfied. Please be in a situation of patient and react accordingly and provide extra knowledge to the patients before patient has a query. Emergency ward one sister was so helpful and kind too. Receptionist in the first floor was very arrogant in handling a painful patient. This is just to improve the satisfaction of other patients definitely not intended to hurt anybody's feelings. My husband wasn't contacted by the doctors and informed my situation from day one and only after the abortion he was called.
reply_text:
I understand your apprehensions
But please understand that if you call me without taking an appointment and I‚Äôm consulting another patient, it would be unfair to the other patient if I take up their time with your call
Your husband not allowed inside is because of the covid situation that we are in and it‚Äôs a hospital policy to not allow an attendee during this time
However, if you had told me that you wanted me to speak with him during your appointment time, I would have been glad to do so

review: She explained the problem I am facing in detail and gave appropriate medicine. I think she should stop scaring patients and she shouldn't tell that "you need to have tablets for life long now".It really scares us.
reply_text: I‚Äôm sorry if the thought of continuing medication scared you, but regular medication is what keeps your thyroid levels normal and helps you lead a normal life, so when asked for how long you need to be on medication,I need to be honest with you!
